entry.title: $2400 // Cobble Hill 2 Bedroom + Exposed Brick, Original Details, Fireplace!
entry.content:
(Listing ID: cl-150698.1) (718) 930-7999


To view our walk through video, please visit our website at: http://destinationrealestate.com/listing?listing=8721-cl

This is a 2 Bedroom Railroad in the Cobble Hill area of Brooklyn. The Apartment Features Exposed Brick, Original Details, Decorative Fireplace, and Ceiling Fan. Dogs and Cats Accepted on Approval.

  • Living Room 9x11
  • Kitchen 14x11
  • Bedroom 16x11
  • Second Bedroom 11x7
  • Bathroom 10x7

Â 

Where is this apartment in relation to other neighborhoods?North of Carroll Gardens, Gowanus, and Red Hook
South of Brooklyn Heights, Downtown Brooklyn
East of Columbia Waterfront District
West of Boerum Hill, Park Slope, Prospect Heights and Fort Greene
